Query: Convert mkv to mp4 with ffmpeg

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Remux MKV video to MP4 without re-encoding audio or video streams
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1370871: Converting MKV to MP4 Using FFMPEG
so_25773929: ffmpeg to convert .avi, .mp4, .mp3, .flv, .mkv to mp4
ul_99425: Batch Convert .mp4 to .avi with ffmpeg
Top-3 Scripts:
so_25773929: for file in *.{flv,avi,mp3,mkv}; do
        target="${file%.*}.mp4"
        [[ -f "$target" ]] && { echo "skipping $file - $target exists" ; continue; }
        echo ffmpeg -r 15  -i "$file"  -b 296k -s 640x320 -vcodec mpeg4 -acodec aac "$target"
done

ul_99425: cat list-of-files.txt | while read file; do ffmpeg -i $file -codec copy ${file%%.mp4}.avi; done

cd /path/; ls *.mp4 | while read file; do ffmpeg -i $file -codec copy ${file%%.mp4}.avi; done

Explanations about Options.-acodec: Set the audio codec. This is an alias for "-codec:a".
Explanations about Options.-vcodec: Set the video codec. This is an alias for "-codec:v".
